body: Typical. Can’t wait to see when he found out.
lol, by the time he's ready to settle down, it's too late, oh well.
Dont like it stupid cheating woman guy did not deserve her I hope he finds out and I hope other guys gf dumps him too

Honestly, No sympathy for the moronic boyfriend, since he pretty much asked for it... He had a girlfriend who wanted to be true blue to him and because he wanted to swing with another woman, the man of that other woman laid down the pipe game better than him causing her to get addicted. Still, doesn't change the fact that the fantastic girlfriend turned into a cheating bitch. But that's what you get when you play with fire.
Would really be awesome to see a third chapter for this one.
